## Bee.depositStake() method

Deposits given amount of BZZ token (in PLUR unit).

Be aware that staked BZZ tokens can \*\*not\*\* be withdrawn.

**Signature:**

```typescript
depositStake(amount: BZZ | NumberString | string | bigint, options?: TransactionOptions, requestOptions?: BeeRequestOptions): Promise<TransactionId>;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

amount


</td><td>

[BZZ](./bee-js-docs-project.bzz.md) \| [NumberString](./bee-js-docs-project.numberstring.md) \| string \| bigint


</td><td>

Amount of BZZ token (in PLUR unit) to be staked. Minimum is 100\_000\_000\_000\_000\_000 PLUR (10 BZZ).


</td></tr>
